body_html: @alextp Thanks for your comment. It would be a great feature for either adding gradient to accumulate_n. I am currently struggling to work around this issue by partially adopting the auto-diff system of tensorflow (by mixing my customized gradient with tensorflow's)

body: @alextp Thanks for your comment. It would be a great feature for either adding gradient to accumulate_n. I am currently struggling to work around this issue by partially adopting the auto-diff system of tensorflow (by mixing my customized gradient with tensorflow's)
